name: Prison Breakout
description:
This is an FPS platformer where you have to escape prison. It combines parkour and shooting to make a fast-paced fun game. There are 3 levels. I created it in a week so it isn't the best. I am terrible at music so there isn't any.  Hope you enjoy

I created 95% of the assets myself. I entered on the submission that I didn't make the assets myself. Sooo... I am so bad at making music so I didn't create any. To be honest no music would sound better! Lol

If you want to see the behind the scenes of making this game check out my youtube channel (If you want, you don't have it :)

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCnkScP4WZVrsNWH6FWf6Eg
